channel.title: sketch on KevOps — DevOps, Cooking, and everything else I want to write about
channel.description: Recent content in sketch on KevOps — DevOps, Cooking, and everything else I want to write about

item.title: Mouse illustration
item.description: I made this illustration for my son to hang up in his room. Feel free to print it out for your kids, too if you want! The illustration files are also available in two formats and can be downloaded from the links below: Sketch SVG It appears that the SVG has different border rendering settings so borders are not inset. You may need to clean it up a bit.

item.title: Mastodon Headers
item.description: Below are some Mastodon headers I made for my Mastodon profile. All color schemes are taken from the @accessibleColors bot which posts random matching accessible colors on Mastodon. Feel free to use these headers for any non-commercial thing you want.
